abstract: Chamberlain denies Allies plan to disturb peace, Commons; text
snippet: LONDON, April 2 (UP)--The salient section of Prime Minister Chamberlain's address in the House of Commons today follows textually:...

headline.main: COMMONS SPEECH IN PART; Salient Section of Chamberlain Address Relates to Neutrals
